title: Pregnant Jenna Dewan drops self-help book after Channing Tatum split
text:
The actress is expecting her second child with boyfriend Steve Kazee (Picture: Getty)

Jewan Dewan looked picture perfect on Tuesday as she wore a gorgeous floral maxi dress to promote her new self-help book Gracefully You.

The actress, who is expecting her second child with boyfriend Steve Kazee, hid her blossoming baby bump in a green maxi dress embellished with leaf print as she read extracts from her book Gracefully You: Finding Beauty And Balance, at The Grove’s Barnes & Noble in Los Angeles.

In the book, Jenna openly discusses her divorce from Channing Tatum and her hurt over the realisation their marriage was over.

‘First and foremost I had to accept the realization this isn’t working and had moved into hurting,’ she wrote.

‘I’d come to realise the dynamic I was in wasn’t serving me nor was it serving my daughter.’

She also shared: ‘People grow and they change and sometimes they don’t grow and change together. So it wasn’t a overnight thing that happened.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘There was no one event. I think it was just a slow realisation that we wanted different things.’

‘I’d come to realise the dynamic I was in wasn’t serving me,’ she shared (Picture: Getty)

Jenna has a six-year-old daughter with Channing (Picture: Getty)

Jenna and Channing had been together since meeting on the set of Step Up in 2006, and the couple married in 2009.

They share six-year-old daughter Everly, but announced they were splitting up in April 2018 after nine years of marriage, with Jenna filing for divorce six months later.

I didn’t know life without Chan.’ (Picture: Getty)

‘I was just gutted. It was so difficult for me. It was the loss of an idealistic future for myself and my life,’ she continued.

‘What does that now look like for me? Where do I begin? I met him when I was 24, I didn’t know life without Chan.’

Channing and Jenna split in 2018 (Picture: Getty Images)

Jenna and Steve, who have been dating since last year, confirmed their baby news in September, sharing in a statement: ‘We are beyond overjoyed and couldn’t be happier to be expanding our family!’

News of the couple’s relationship was confirmed in October last year.

Jenna took to Instagram in June to make her relationship with Steve social media official (Picture: Splash)

A source confirmed that Step Up dancer Jenna, 38, had been dating Steve, 43, who won the Tony for his performance in the Broadway production Once, ‘for a couple of months’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Jenna took to Instagram in June to make her relationship with Steve social media official as she captioned a sweet shot of her resting her head on his shoulder: ‘Speaking of peace…’

description: Jenna Dewan and boyfriend are expecting their first child, 18 months after she split from Channing Tatum.
